author: Jennifer Van Evra
title: New order limits long-term care workers to a single facility in wake of COVID-19 outbreaks
description: A new order from B.C.'s provincial health officer aims to curb the spread of the virus at care facilities.
content:
Starting this week, workers in British Columbia's long-term care, acute care and assisted-living facilities will be limited to working in a single facility, following a new order by provincial health officer Dr. Bonnie Henry.
